content: in this legal case the court has reached a final resolution regarding the administration of the assets of a deceased person the apartment association which was responsible for the assets is being released from its position the costs for preserving the assets and the maintenance fee for the apartment association have been determined the apartment association has the right to receive money from the sale of the apartment but certain costs will be withheld they must deposit the money into a bank account within 7 days the court will send a court order to the parties involved to make an entry in the inheritance register and terminate storage measures the parties involved have the right to appeal the decision within 15 days the court also appointed a guardian for the assets and later transferred the property to the successor assets custodians the custodian has now requested the termination of storage measures and submitted a report and expense documents the court has requested information about bank accounts and money belonging to the assets from the heirs the court decided to terminate the management of the assets and release the apartment association from its position the custodian fulfilled their obligations and paid off debts the court also discussed the fees that should be charged for managing the assets and determined a compensation amount the court provided a timeline of important dates related to the case the court also explained its own progress in processing the case and determined the necessary working hours and fees the court divided the assets among the heirs and ordered the custodian to pay a portion of the remaining amount to the heirs the court also mentioned the rights of the heirs regarding the accumulated pension fund units and made entries in the succession register any interested party can file an appeal to terminate maintenance measures or claim compensation for the costs of implementing savings measures
